name: Tea Chair: Cool Breeze
description: Simple and elegant, this handsome wooden seat is made of hard Sandbearer Wood and can be commonly seen around the Jiulue Teahouse in Yilong Wharf and other such establishments. It is specially designed for guests to enjoy tea and listen to stories.\nListening to a captivating opera story, indulging in the sweet nectar of aromatic tea as the breeze gently washes over you, as the fragrant beverage seems to whisper sweet subtleties only you can comprehend. Ah, now that's how to kick back and spend your day relaxing in Yilong Wharf! Now that's happiness.
